mapper.select: SELECT product_no as `name` , SUM(cnumber) AS `value` FROM `co_contract_product` WHERE company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY product_no ORDER BY `value` DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT a.A1 AS `name`,IFNULL(b.`value`,0) AS `value` FROM `st_online_info` AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(`time`,"%H") AS mytime,COUNT(1) AS `value` FROM `st_sys_log` WHERE company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY mytime) AS b ON a.A1 = b.mytime
